note.descZh: 农历八月十五，赏月团圆、吃月饼、提灯笼。传说有嫦娥、玉兔、吴刚。圆月象征团圆与思念。
note.descEn: On the 15th day of the 8th lunar month, families reunite to admire the full moon, share mooncakes and lanterns—symbols of togetherness and longing.

note.descZh: 苏轼 1076 年名篇，借月寄怀，表达“人有悲欢离合，月有阴晴圆缺”的人生感悟，结句“但愿人长久，千里共婵娟”。
note.descEn: Su Shi’s 1076 classic reflects on reunion and separation through the moon; closing wish: “May we all be blessed with longevity, though thousands of miles apart.”

note.descZh: 寓意驱邪纳福、开运迎吉。分南北狮，锣鼓点配合腾挪跳跃；常见于新春、开业、庆典。
note.descEn: A symbol of luck and protection; Southern/Northern styles with acrobatics to drum–gong rhythms.

note.descZh: “唱念做打”兼具，生旦净丑四行当；脸谱色彩寓意性格，如红忠勇、黑刚直、白多疑。
